{"id":1194729544,"question_id":3276,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â week","timestamp":1709649848,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"191 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1194729544/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Pushes to Type Word II","memory":"29.6 MB","code":"#define F first\n#define S second\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumPushes(string word) {\n        using pic = pair<int, char>;\n        map<char, int> cnt;\n        vector<pic> v;\n        \n        for(char ch: word) cnt[ch]++;\n        for(auto [key, val]: cnt) v.push_back({val, key});\n        sort(v.rbegin(), v.rend());\n\n        int ans = 0, enc = 0;\n        for(pic sv: v){\n            //cout << sv.F << ' ' << sv.S << endl;\n            ans += (enc / 8 + 1) * sv.F;\n            enc++;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-pushes-to-type-word-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
